title: One of the most boring movies I've ever seen
review: I wanted to quit this about 40 minutes in but my wife wanted to finish it. I guess she likes Gosling. So unbelievably boring. I would expect them to make it exciting since it's the seven thousandth movie about the moon landing.

title: Best horror flick since the Shining
review: Amazing amazing movie. If the main chick in it doesn't win an Oscar then the Academy Awards are rigged.

title: So bad
review: A total cash grab. I was supposed to care about the main character, I didn't. Mostly all drama and nonsense. To be honest, I couldn't even finish it so. It was just too awful.
